title: MicroSim Dublin Core Metadata Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating MicroSim metadata.json files using Dublin Core elements

title.description: The name given to the MicroSim

description.description: An account of the MicroSim's purpose and functionality

creator.description: The person or organization primarily responsible for creating the MicroSim

date.description: Date of creation or publication (ISO 8601 format recommended)

subject.description: The topic or keywords describing the MicroSim's content

type.description: The nature or genre of the resource (e.g., 'Interactive Simulation', 'Educational Software')

language.description: The language of the resource (ISO 639 code recommended, e.g., 'en', 'en-US')

rights.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource (e.g., 'CC BY 4.0', 'MIT License')

identifier.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource (e.g., URL, DOI)

source.description: A related resource from which this MicroSim is derived

relation.description: A related resource (e.g., URL to related content)

coverage.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource

publisher.description: The entity responsible for making the resource available

learningResourceType.description: The type of learning resource (e.g., 'simulation', 'interactive demonstration')

audience.description: The intended audience for the MicroSim

concepts.description: Key concepts demonstrated in the MicroSim
